Portfolio

Some of the stuff I did

Eurozagreb student tournament

Eurozagreb is annual sport tournament for students all over the world. The website is fully built from scratch so it meets the needs of tournament. Back-end is developed in Codeigniter while the front-end has only Bootstrap framework for styling.

Organ Vida photography festival

Organ Vida is a two-week international photography festival that takes place every fall in Zagreb, Croatia. Whole website is built from scratch in Wordpress based on designer mockups.

Volleyball club Gorica

Website for top level volleyball club in Croatia is built from scratch in Wordpress with unique template build especially for this work.

Comwear

Comwear is IT company for which I developed unique website to represent their services and clients they worked with.

For photography portfolio please visit my Tumblr page
